abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32898341, pmid32907678, pmid32897566, pmid32895242, pmid32876695, pmid32906151, pmid32895609, pmid32870978, pmid32905684, pmid32898242, pmid32898272, pmid32902889, pmid32902868
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.09.15
